Frame:Manner verbs

From EN MetaNet Wiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Name Gloss Manner verbs
Transcription
Description This frame is not a real frame. It is merely a container for verbs that express manner of motion. Sorry. I wish I didn't have to do this. :(
Closest FrameNet Frame(s) Self_motion
Maps to IARPA Source Concept(s)
Other aliases
Comments
Family Manner and path verbs
Tags
Type
Cultural Scope American English
